entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4.
